Authors: Young Woon Lim, Jacqueline S. Lee
Title:
Cerrena aurantiopora sp. nov. (Polyporaceae) from East
Asia
Abstract:
A new species of polypore in the genus Cerrena was
discovered in Kangwon Province, Korea. The resupinate basidiocarp and
light orange, poroid hymenophore were different enough for it to be
distinguished from previously recorded species of Cerrena, C. consors,
C. cystidiata, C. sclerodepsis and C. unicolor. Based on the results of
morphological and phylogenetic analyses, we propose this new polypore as
Cerrena aurantiopora sp. nov.
